p: The mean relative BWG ratio of each group is shown in Figure 5. The initial weights between groups of chickens were not significant (data are not shown). The BW of all three RN-supplemented groups did not increase significantly when compared between groups or with the PC group ( p > 0.05) or even with the Sacox-treated group. Therefore, our data demonstrated that the RN leaf powder did not increase the BWG effectively at the current dose used.
